mapper.sql: tx_hash as txHash, tx_type as txType, tx_time as txTime, block_height as blockHeight, confirm_flag as confirmFlag, block_index as blockIndex, fee as fee
mapper.select: select tx_hash AS txHash, tx_type AS txType, tx_time AS txTime, block_height AS blockHeight, confirm_flag AS confirmFlag, block_index AS blockIndex, fee AS fee, event_log AS eventLog, ontid_tx_flag AS ontidTxFlag, called_contract_hash AS calledContractHash from tbl_tx_eventlog where tx_hash = #{txHash} limit 1

SELECT tx_hash AS txHash, tx_type AS txType, tx_time AS txTime, block_height AS blockHeight, confirm_flag AS confirmFlag, block_index AS blockIndex, fee AS fee, event_log AS eventLog, ontid_tx_flag AS ontidTxFlag, called_contract_hash AS calledContractHash FROM tbl_tx_eventlog tx INNER JOIN ( SELECT id FROM tbl_tx_eventlog WHERE id <= (SELECT max(id) - #{startIndex} FROM tbl_tx_eventlog) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} ) tmp ON tx.id = tmp.id

SELECT tx_hash AS txHash, tx_type AS txType, tx_time AS txTime, block_height AS blockHeight, confirm_flag AS confirmFlag, block_index AS blockIndex, fee AS fee, event_log AS eventLog, ontid_tx_flag AS ontidTxFlag, called_contract_hash AS calledContractHash FROM tbl_tx_eventlog WHERE ontid_tx_flag = FALSE ORDER BY block_height DESC LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
select from tbl_tx_eventlog where block_height = #{blockHeight} order by block_index
